mapper.select: SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) AS WEEKLY_SALES_AMOUNT, COUNT(*) AS WEEKLY_SALES_NUMBER_OF_CASES FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_REGDATE >= TO_DATE('2021-11-07','YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_REGDATE <= TO_DATE('2021-11-13','YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) AS MONTHLY_SALES_AMOUNT, COUNT(*) AS MONTHLY_SALES_NUMBER_OF_CASES FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_REGDATE >= TO_DATE('2021-11-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_REGDATE <= TO_DATE('2021-11-30','YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) AS PAYMENT_PRICE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_REGDATE = TO_DATE('2021-11-13','YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(o.ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, o.USER_NO, p.PAYMENT_PRICE, p.PAYMENT_TYPE, o.PAYMENT_STATUS, o.PAYMENT_DELIVERY_STATUS FROM ORDERS o, PAYMENT p WHERE o.ORDER_NO = p.ORDER_NO ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC) x) WHERE rnum <= 5
SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) AS CURRENT_SALES_STATUS, COUNT(*) AS CURRENT_SALES_NUMBER_OF_CASES FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_REGDATE = TO_DATE('2021-11-13','YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS Allcount from (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT g.GOODS_NO, g.GOODS_TITLE, g.GOODS_PRICE, g.GOODS_STOCK FROM GOODS g, PROJECT p WHERE g.PRO_NO = p.PRO_NO AND p.COMPANY_NO = '4' ORDER BY g.PRO_NO DESC) x) ORDER BY rnum

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT o.ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(o.ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, o.USER_NO, p.PAYMENT_PRICE, p.PAYMENT_TYPE, o.PAYMENT_STATUS, o.PAYMENT_DELIVERY_STATUS, p.PAYMENT_BANKNAME, od.ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDERS o, PAYMENT p, ORDER_DETAIL od WHERE o.ORDER_NO = p.ORDER_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = od.ORDER_NO AND USER_NO = '#{searchKeyword}'%'
AND PAYMENT_BANKNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND PAYMENT_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND PAYMENT_STATUS LIKE ''%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND PAYMENT_DELIVERY_STATUS LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC) x) WHERE rnum BETWEEN '1' AND '10' WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
